channel.title: [Refractored] Update Server [Refractored]

item.title: [Refractored] Update Server [Refractored]
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Hey MoparScape,

I’m using Galkons Refractored.

I made a webclient but it is having trouble at the update server, it just goes black page and says;

23mq5vc.jpg770×505

Here is the error;

Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60

Note: That isn’t a picture from my client, but thats what it says. The reason i know it is the update server is because I added logging to show if it has passed something but it stops there and gives that error. So how can I fix it?

Here is my Update server;

Update Server:

drawLoadingText(60, "Connecting to update server"); onDemandFetcher = new OnDemandFetcher(); onDemandFetcher.start(streamLoader_6, this); Class36.method528(onDemandFetcher.getAnimCount()); Model.method459(onDemandFetcher.getVersionCount(0), onDemandFetcher); preloadModels(); if (!lowMem) { nextSong = 0; try { nextSong = Integer.parseInt(getParameter("music")); } catch (Exception _ex) { } songChanging = true; onDemandFetcher.method558(2, nextSong); while (onDemandFetcher.getNodeCount() > 0) { processOnDemandQueue(); try { Thread.sleep(100L); } catch (Exception _ex) { } if (onDemandFetcher.anInt1349 > 3) { loadError(); return; } } }

Thanks.
